abstract: PetroChina is planning the nation’s biggest share sale this year to raise as much as $6 billion in Shanghai for overseas acquisitions, increased oil drilling and refinery construction.
lead_paragraph: PetroChina is planning the nation’s biggest share sale this year to raise as much as $6 billion in Shanghai for overseas acquisitions, increased oil drilling and refinery construction.

headline.main: Petrochina Seeks $6 Billion in Shanghai Share Sale
